name: The Canva Cheatsheet
description: Graphic designer, who?When did you find out that being a solopreneur/ Notion template creator requires you to be great at marketing AND designing? If Canva isn't your best friend yet, are you living under a rock??? (Just kidding).Canva is a go-to for many creators and also myself when it comes to designing our marketing materials. This template will teach you how to optimize your time in Canva while providing you insights into elevating your designs.What's included?Over 50+ recommendations for F
features: Over 50+ recommendations for Font pairings and elements; Exercises to strengthen your design skills and branding; How do I use it?As long as you have a Notion account, all you have to do is download the page and hit duplicate at the top right of the template.; I don't have a paid account, does this still work?Yes! It works the same
